content.en: Sports analytics: Researchers are using computing and machine learning advancements to accurately predict the outcomes of the NCAA men's basketball tournament. Machine learning algorithms are also being used to analyze pass location data in soccer and uncover insights into team styles and predict shots. In addition, machine learning is being applied to various sports, such as baseball and football, to model scoring probability, predict match outcomes, and evaluate player performance.
content.da: Sportsanalyse: Forskere bruger fremskridt inden for databehandling og maskinlæring til nøjagtigt at forudsige udfaldet af NCAA mændenes basketballturnering. Maskinlæringsalgoritmer bruges også til at analysere pasningspositiondata i fodbold og afdække indsigt i holdstile samt forudsige skud. Derudover anvendes maskinlæring i forskellige sportsgrene, såsom baseball og amerikansk fodbold, til at modellere scoringssandsynlighed, forudsige kampresultater og evaluere spillerpræstationer.
